abstract: Sidney Crosby, who is recovering from a concussion sustained last January, said he would not play in the Pittsburgh Penguins' regular-season opener in Vancouver on Oct. 6.
snippet: Sidney Crosby, who is recovering from a concussion sustained last January, said he would not play in the Pittsburgh Penguins' regular-season opener in Vancouver on Oct. 6.
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby said Saturday he would not play in the Pittsburgh Penguins' regular-season opener in Vancouver on Oct. 6.

headline.main: Crosby Is Out for Penguins' Opener
